pr_title: envoy: update envoy ref and update config to v3 supported schema

timeline.message:
remove v2 ref

Signed-off-by: Jose Nino <jnino@lyft.com>

timeline.author: junr03
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -16,17 +16,18 @@ const char* config_template = R"(
             - endpoint:
                 address:
                   socket_address: {address: {{ domain }}, port_value: 443}
-    tls_context: &base_tls_context
-      common_tls_context:
-        validation_context:
-          trusted_ca:
-            inline_string: |
+    transport_socket: &base_transport_socket

+        common_tls_context:
+          validation_context:

 )"
